fields.name: Subalignments:
fields.value: Introduction, Rising Action, Climax, Falling Action, Conclusion

fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
- Only one role of each subalignment may spawn or exist at a time.
- Factional chat.
- Factional kill.
- If any default subalignment is missing, a member may choose to skip their night action in order to change into a random role from that subalignment.
- Members create a story that, when complete, will be read to the town, and all actions tied to it will happen immediately.
